output.summary: iOS UI testing analysis completed. Found 15 test patterns covering login flow, navigation, and gesture handling. XCUITest best practices validated with 95% compliance.

findings.title: Missing Accessibility Identifiers
findings.description: 3 UI elements in LoginViewController lack accessibility identifiers, making test selection unreliable

findings.title: Hard-coded Timeouts
findings.description: Test uses fixed 5-second timeout instead of waitForExistence

findings.title: Missing Device Orientation Tests
findings.description: No tests validate landscape orientation layouts

recommendations.title: Add Accessibility Identifiers to All Interactive Elements
recommendations.description: Use accessibilityIdentifier property on all buttons, text fields, and interactive elements for reliable test selection

recommendations.title: Replace Thread.sleep with waitForExistence
recommendations.description: Use XCTAssertTrue(element.waitForExistence(timeout: 10)) instead of fixed sleeps for more reliable tests

recommendations.title: Implement Page Object Pattern
recommendations.description: Refactor tests to use Page Object pattern for better maintainability and reusability

artifacts.description: Visual HTML report with test coverage breakdown
